question: Gobustan National Park, Maiden Tower, Palace of Shirvanshas are the famous UNESCO World Heritage Sites of which one of the following nations?
explanation: Gobustan State Reserve is famous for its rock carvings and petroglyphs portraying the past life in the Caucasus. Palace of Shirvanshahs is a 15th-century palace built by the then ruling Shirvans, which is an example of Azerbaijan architecture. Maiden Tower is one of the Azerbaijan national emblems.
